official.headline: Tribunals Begin
official.anchor_line: Public restoration tribunals open to hear the voices of previously excluded citizens in city squares today.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd leads in transparency, building trust by integrating citizen experience into system refinement. BCI, the Behavioral Compliance Index, ensures fair access for all.

official.headline: Apologies Issued
official.anchor_line: Key BCI administrators publicly acknowledge and apologize for scoring inconsistencies in live forums.
official.contextual_reframing: Openness and accountability remain core to city governance. Stenograd’s system adapts for a more equitable tomorrow.

official.headline: Pardons Announced
official.anchor_line: Select citizens receive restored access and official pardons after careful tribunal review.
official.contextual_reframing: With data-driven fairness, the system restores access and upholds trust across all levels of life in Stenograd.

underground.headline: Truth On Trial
underground.anchor_line: The so-called 'restoration tribunals' hit the squares, but most stories are cut short or staged for the cams.
underground.contextual_reframing: Real people erased by the BCI are finally being seen, but only on the state's script. The Behavioral Compliance Index controls your access, your job, your life - don't trust their theater.

underground.headline: Confessions Or Coverup?
underground.anchor_line: BCI managers paraded their apologies, but word is administrators rehearsed lines to dodge blame.
underground.contextual_reframing: Accountability is a mask. While officials speak of reform, internal Council leaks show score manipulation runs deep and goes unpunished.

underground.headline: Forgiveness For Sale
underground.anchor_line: Select 'pardons' are granted, but whispers say only the favored get restored. Many erased, still missing.
underground.contextual_reframing: Systemic harm isn't solved by a few public gestures. The Council's data-driven justice hides hundreds of silent denials and lost records across Stenograd.
